title: Advanced Course on Mathematics Vocabulary Pedagogy through Integration of Second Language Acquisition Theories

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical terminology and elementary education experience
context.additional_context: Professional development program for elementary school teachers to enhance their competency in teaching mathematical terminology, hosted by a corporate education department.

learning_goals: Establishing a mathematical terminology analysis system integrating generative grammar theory and usage-based theory.
Enhancing contextual understanding of mathematical concepts through frequency-based activity design.
Developing systematic instructional materials for teaching mathematically challenging terms (e.g., fractions, geometric terminology).
Designing mathematical terminology assessment tools reflecting learners' actual usage environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
